text:
The Loverman Jerry Wade keeps you company while you're on the j-o-b, Monday - Friday from 10 a.m. - 3 p.m. Born and raised in Indianapolis and former longtime Quiet Storm host, Jerry just wants to keep you motivated and help you have a great day. At 11 a.m. tune in for Jerry's Classifieds as he helps you make that big career move or find a job. Then at Noon, he and DJ King turn it up during the 12 O'clock Throwback Mix. An avid lover of all things Indianapolis, his goal is simply to see you smile. Call Jerry at 317-239-1067 or on our Twitter, Facebook and Instagram pages at @1067WTLC. Hashtag #WorkWithJerry. Jerry Wade, an Indianapolis native, has been honored by a few of Indianapolis’ beloved organizations. Including, The Mozel Sanders We Feed the Hungry program Radio Award and the Indiana Black Expo Radio Broadcast Media Award.

WTLC Featured Video CLOSE

Jay-Z dropped his new music video, The Story of O.J., on TIDAL earlier today. The 4 minute and 16-second piece is the latest “visual” to come out from the rapper’s 4:44 album, which has already gone platinum in less than one week out, according to TIDAL.

The music video is animated and takes on racist cartoons from Fleischer Studios, Warner Bros., Disney, and others.

Source EOnline

Dj King Turn It Up During The O'Clock Throwback Mix. An Avid Lover Of All Things Indianapolis
